name: Mech Nyakiru
description:

Story

Year 2035 - Japan was invaded by an alien Race.
Your Name is Nyakiru and you have been trained for years to kill them all.
Take you Mech and destroy the alien Race.. Now is the time..

How To play

Help Nyakiru to destroy the enemy bases, use the Mecha to kill the biggest enemies. 

Collect Medical kits to recover Nyakiru health and the battery for the Mecha Energy.

To move use the arrows (ASWD)

To shoot use LEFT-CTRL

To use the Mecha go near and press Space.

To exit from Mecha press X.

KILL ALL THEM BASES to go to the next Level.
